definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to epistemology or theory of knowledge , as a field of study .
Synonym of epistemic ( “ of or relating to cognition or knowledge , its scope , or how it is acquired ” ) .

main_definition: Of or pertaining to epistemology or theory of knowledge , as a field of study .
secondary_definitions: Synonym of epistemic ( “ of or relating to cognition or knowledge , its scope , or how it is acquired ” ) .
